HPpotS_.name: Health Potion (Small)
HPpotS_.desc: A small potion that restores 80 HP. One time use.

HPpotM_.name: Health Potion (Medium)
HPpotM_.desc: A medium potion that restores 60 HP. Two time use.

HPpotL_.name: Health Potion (Large)
HPpotL_.desc: A large potion that restores 50 HP. Three time use.

RestoRing_.name: Ring of Restoration
RestoRing_.desc: A ring that restores (WIS x 2) HP to the wearer after an enemy attack.

Firebomb_.name: Firebomb
Firebomb_.desc: A bomb that can be used to inflict 50 damage to an enemy.

VampC_.name: Vampiric Charm
VampC_.desc: A necklace that heals the wearer for 20% of the damage they deal.
